page.title: 11Recreation: Children's Games
page.content: We have three classes in our school and we decided to do a survey to find out which games children in each class liked playing. The Infant girls like playing Mummies and Daddies best of all, also coloured eggs, horses and wishes. They like to change games every week. The boys liked games like running, catch and cops & robbers. The girls in Class 2 like 40-40, a sort of hide and seek game; horses and It. The boys like running, scraps and racing. They all seem to stick to their own best game. The girls in Class 1 like Bull-Dog best, where one goes into the middle and tries to catch the other people. When all have been caught, the first one caught goes into the middle. The boys like scraps!
